comments.content: Hi, would you please tell which font did you use for this poster? Thanks in advance.
Jan's just given the answer... [Romeral](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426052028/http:/typies.blogspot.com/2006/12/romeral-display-typeface.html) by Juan-Pablo de Gregorio
Hi, Yu. Please don't post the same topic/question twice. Thanks!
